description: Try our easy to follow Fried Rice with Hoisin Pork recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Fried rice,Low saturated fat,High protein,Rice,Pork,Low sugar,Christmas leftovers,Leftovers,Easter leftovers
name: Fried Rice with Hoisin Pork Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Cook rice following packet instructions. Spread onto a large, shallow tray and place in the fridge overnight to chill.
Combine hoisin, soy sauce and five spice seasoning in a medium bowl. Add sliced pork and stir to coat. Refrigerate overnight to chill.
Heat a wok over high heat. Add a little of the oil, and the eggs. Stir to scramble until set.

Transfer to a bowl, add remaining oil to wok with onion, carrot, peas and garlic. Cook for 2 minutes. Add rice and cook, tossing, for 8 minutes until rice is heated through and toasted. Stir through cooked egg and half of the spring onions. Keep warm.
Heat a separate pan on medium-high heat. Strain marinade from pork. Add oil and cook pork, in batches, until browned.
Serve fried rice with pork and garnish with remaining spring onions.
